brands.heading: Connect
brands.para: Aesthetic Record Makes It Easy to Connect with Your Patients Anytime, Anywhere
brands.notes: No Credit Card Required, 14 Day Free Trial

types.heading: Online Patient Booking
types.para: You can be in touch with patients around the clock. Two-way communication makes it easy to manage changing schedules, and capturing credit information reduces cancellations.

types.heading: Smart Scheduling
types.para: You set the hours, appointment durations, equipment, and available providers, and our smart booking system ensures you never have to deal with double-booking or inefficient scheduling again.

types.heading: Web-Based Patient Portal
types.para: Patients can book appointments, access pre-appointment information, fill out questionnaires and view post appointment instructions. Adding a membership or viewing the patient wallet can be done from anywhere in the Patient Portal!
